title: RIOT PLEASE BAN THIS GUY
body: I have a friend on league who wasn't the best player.  but he recently payed some guy to boost him.  His winrate spiked and he even got mastery 6 on a champ that the guy played.  I would have been fine with it but instead he starts bragging about his elo.  so I unfriended him kicked him from my club and told him to change his password and play his own games to get back in.  He didn't stop.  so I guess he needs his account banned to teach him.

replies.body: What does it mean to boost?
It means you pay a better player to either play with you, or play your account. It is basically cheating and results in permban if caught.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=PP0LwfuV,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-31T00:25:17.629+0000)
>
> It means you pay a better player to either play with you, or play your account. It is basically cheating and results in permban if caught.

Oh, guess I wouldn't know, because I am always getting carried, so I don't have to play! In fact, I also carry aaaaaaaaaaaaaal of my games! Yep! In fact, I'm challenger! Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha -sobs in corner for hour-

> [{quoted}](name=Emojay,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=PP0LwfuV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-31T00:17:12.195+0000)
>
> What does it mean to boost?

Riot please investigate this account for boosting, only a booster would post a question like this.
Tell riot they will take it from there.

That's the thing if I tell riot themselves they wont do anything about it.  they'll say that they cant share account info with us which means they wont say if hes being boosted.  but I ALREADY know hes being boosted he told me and even showed me the website.  RIOT BAN HIM.

> I have a friend on league who wasn't the best player. but he recently payed some guy to boost him. His winrate spiked and he even got mastery 6 on a champ that the guy played. I would have been fine with it but instead he starts bragging about his elo. so I unfriended him kicked him from my club and told him to change his password and play his own games to get back in. He didn't stop. so I guess he needs his account banned to teach him.

Ur a pleb.
